summary: This release introduces smart task management by migrating from a simple TODO list to a full GitHub Issues pipeline, making it easier to track and resolve work in bulk. We've made important stability improvements across our monitoring system to reduce false alerts and ensure smoother health checks for your blog. The release also adds new knowledge base articles and refines our status page, continuing our focus on a polished, reliable experience for every Grove community.

features: add grove-issues skill for bulk TODO-to-issue pipeline
add BATS test suite for issue functions
add GitHub Issues task management functions
add landing component to auto-label workflow
add GitHub issue templates and automation workflows
add "What is Firefly?" knowledge base article (#444)
fixes: use Sparkles icon for Gossamer in toolIcons registry
reduce false positives in auto-label workflow
cap latency-only status at degraded for healthy services
debounce status flapping for blog engine health checks
update component status on recovery without active incident
use pnpm package for engine dep in clearing deploy
skip svelte-check in clearing deploy (pre-existing type issues)
exclude maintenance from overall status calculation
overhaul auto-label workflow to prevent over-tagging
use toArray instead of one() in deployed DO worker
